bio: I am currently pursuing a master's degree in software engineering at Northeastern University, where I am learning and applying advanced concepts and skills in software design, development, testing, documentation, and process improvement. I am passionate about creating high performance scalable software and learning new technologies on the go.

2.description: Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering

1.name: Nubewell Networks
1.description: Enhanced the security infrastructure for over 900+ customer locations with a high-performance, highly scalable/reliable Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) network security solution.

2.name: Ribbon Communications
2.description: Designed and developed the DPI (deep-packet inspection) engine that analyzes and generates intelligent data from real-time traffic captured on 4G VoLTE, VoWifi and IMS networks.

1.name: Cloud Native Application for Peak Performance
1.tech_stack_used: Go, PostgresQL, Cloud(AWS, GCP), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Packer, Github Actions
1.description: A Golang web application to authenticate users through Email and store users with PostgresQL deployed on Google Cloud Provider(GCP) using Github Actions

2.name: Golang JSON Query Engine
2.tech_stack_used: Go, AWS(DynamoDB), RESTful APIs, ElasticSearch, ElasticMQ, AWS SQS, RabbitMQ, OAuth 2.0
2.description: A Go web application which stores a complex json document in a key-value store and supports CRUD operations. The web app also supports complex queries and searching capabilities using Elastic Search and Kibana.

3.name: Google Cloud IaC Terraform
3.description: A repository to provision infrastructure for GCP services through Terraform. The IaC will provision the following Google Cloud Services - VPC, Compute Engine, Cloud SQL, Cloud Function, DNS, Load balancer, AutoScaler, SSL, Logging, CMEK. The Github repo has workflow ensure Continuous Integration.

4.name: Google Cloud Function - serverless
4.description: A serverless function for Google Cloud Function to send out email verification links for authentication of registered users.

5.name: A Keyless Approach to Home Security using Internet of Things
5.description: Engineered a highly cost-efficient intelligent home security system leveraging Raspberry Pi technology. Developed a data-driven door unlocking system, leveraging facial recognition technology and a mobile application, enhancing security measures and improving accessibility for authorized personnel.

6.name: Spotify Clone
6.description: Clone of Spotify Application, implemented functionality to returns the albums of the specified artists.

7.name: Go application for Health-Check DB
7.description: Golang web application to implement health check for Postgres Database Connection

8.name: Stock Management System
8.description: A java application to replicate a stock trading platform

9.name: Hash Table in C
9.description: Code to build a hash table in C

1.description: First author of a highly influential paper published in IJRASET, generating over 3,000 downloads and establishing it as one of the most referenced papers in 2020, contributing to the advancement of knowledge in the field
